Translations.Text: Ta shcho Miy retribution yavlyaye soboyu naybilʹsh bolisnyy retribution
Informuyutʹ yikh pro Abraham hosti
Koly vony vnesly yoho kvartaly, vony skazaly, "Myr." Vin skazav, "My apprehensive pro vas
Vony skazaly, "Ne apprehensive. My mayemo harnu novynu dlya vas: vysvitlenyy syn
Vin skazav, "Yak vy mozhete daty meni taka harna novyna, koly ya mozhu ye tak staryy? Vy dosi dayete meni tsya harna novyna
Vony skazaly, harna novyna my dayemo vy ye virni; ne rozpach
Vin skazav, "Nikhto vidchayi yoho myloserdya Lorda, krim strayers
Vin skazav, "Shcho vasha misiya, O kur'yery
Vony skazaly, "My vidpravlyayemosya do vynuvatykh lyudey
Yak dlya rodyny Doli, my vryatuyemo yikh vsikh
Ale ne yoho druzhyna; vona destined buty z pryrechenyy
kur'yery poyikhaly do mista Doli
Vin skazav, "Vy ye nevidomi lyudy
Vony skazaly, "My prynosymo do vas shcho vony maly sumniv
My prynosymo do vas pravda; my ye pravdyvi
Vy budete vzyaty vashu rodynu pid chas nochi. Zalyshtesya pozadu nykh, ta perekonuyetesya shcho zhoden z vas pohlyady nazad. Poyidʹte pryamo yak nakazane
My dostavyly yomu tse komanda: tsi lyudy musyatʹ buty vynyshcheni u ranku
lyudy mista prybuly joyfully
Vin skazav, "Tse - moyi hosti; ne zbentezhte meni
Bo BOHA, ta ne sorom meni
Vony skazaly, my ne nakazaly vam z kontaktuyuchykh budʹ khto
Vin skazav, "Osʹ moyi dochky, yakshcho vy povynni
Ale, na zhalʹ!, vony povnistyu blinded yikhnim lust
Otzhe, lykho vrazyty yikh u ranku
My povernuly tse upside vnyz, ta showered yim z spustoshlyvymy skelyamy
Tse ye urok dlya tsykh khto volodiyutʹ rozvidkoyu
Tse bude zavzhdy yavlyaty soboyu systemu
Tse ye znak dlya viruyuchiv
lyudy lisiv takozh porushnyky
Otzhe, my avenged z nykh, ta obydva spilʹnoty tsilkom documented
lyudy Alʹ-Hijr disbelieved kur'yery
My daly yim nashi vidkryttya, ale vony disregarded yim
Vony zvychayno vyrizaly nadiyni domivky z hor
lykho udaryayutʹ yikh u ranku
Shcho vony prykhovaly ne dopomohly yim
My ne utvoryly nebo ta zemlyu, ta vse mizh nymy, krim dlya spetsyfichnoyi mety. Kinetsʹ svitu prybude, tak obroblyayutʹ yikh z velykodushnoyu znevahoyu
Vash Lord yavlyaye soboyu Creator, Omniscient
My daly vam sim pary, ta velyki Quran
Ne budemo revnyvyy shcho my podaruvaly inshyy (kur'yery), ta ne budemo zasmucheni (disbelievers), ta nyzhche vashe krylo dlya viruyuchiv
Ta proholoshuyutʹ: "YA yavlyayu soboyu ochevydnyy warner
My budemo maty spravu z dividers
Vony vyznayutʹ Quran tilʹky chastkovo
vashym Lordom, my dopytayemo yikh vsikh
pro vse vony zrobyly
Tomu, vykonuyete zamovy dani vam, ta disregard idolu worshipers
My zekonomymo vas mockers
khto vstanovlyuvav inshoho boha bilya BOHA. Vony bezsumnivno znaydutʹ
My znayemo povni dobre shcho vy mozhete buty rozdratovani yikhnimy vyslovamy
Vy budete zaspivaty pokhvaly vashoho Lorda, ta budete z prostrators
Ta obozhnyuyutʹ vashoho Lorda, aby dosyahnuty certainty
